verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> be unto the pastors <S%H7462><s%> that destroy <S%H6><s%> and scatter <S%H6327><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of my pasture <S%H4830><s%>! saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> against the pastors <S%H7462><s%> that feed <S%H7462><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%>; Ye have scattered <S%H6327><s%> my flock <S%H6629><s%>, and driven them away <S%H5080><s%>, and have not visited <S%H6485><s%> them: behold, I will visit <S%H6485><s%> upon you the evil <S%H7455><s%> of your doings <S%H4611><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And I will gather <S%H6908><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of my flock <S%H6629><s%> out of all countries <S%H776><s%> whither I have driven <S%H5080><s%> them, and will bring them again <S%H7725><s%> to their folds <S%H5116><s%>; and they shall be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and increase <S%H7235><s%>.

And I will set up <S%H6965><s%> shepherds <S%H7462><s%> over them which shall feed <S%H7462><s%> them: and they shall fear <S%H3372><s%> no more, nor be dismayed <S%H2865><s%>, neither shall they be lacking <S%H6485><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Behold, the days <S%H3117><s%> come <S%H935><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, that I will raise <S%H6965><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> a righteous <S%H6662><s%> Branch <S%H6780><s%>, and a King <S%H4428><s%> shall reign <S%H4427><s%> and prosper <S%H7919><s%>, and shall execute <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> and justice <S%H6666><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>.

In his days <S%H3117><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall be saved <S%H3467><s%>, and Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> safely <S%H983><s%>: and this is his name <S%H8034><s%> whereby he shall be called <S%H7121><s%>, THE LORD OUR RIGHTEOUSNESS <S%H3072><s%>. THE LORD: Heb. Jehovahtsidkenu

Therefore, behold, the days <S%H3117><s%> come <S%H935><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, that they shall no more say <S%H559><s%>, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, which brought up <S%H5927><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>;

But, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, which brought up <S%H5927><s%> and which led <S%H935><s%> the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the north <S%H6828><s%> country <S%H776><s%>, and from all countries <S%H776><s%> whither I had driven <S%H5080><s%> them; and they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in their own land <S%H127><s%>.

Mine heart <S%H3820><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me is broken <S%H7665><s%> because of the prophets <S%H5030><s%>; all my bones <S%H6106><s%> shake <S%H7363><s%>; I am like a drunken <S%H7910><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, and like a man <S%H1397><s%> whom wine <S%H3196><s%> hath overcome <S%H5674><s%>, because <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and because of the words <S%H1697><s%> of his holiness <S%H6944><s%>.

For the land <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of adulterers <S%H5003><s%>; for because <S%H6440><s%> of swearing <S%H423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> mourneth <S%H56><s%>; the pleasant places <S%H4999><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> are dried up <S%H3001><s%>, and their course <S%H4794><s%> is evil <S%H7451><s%>, and their force <S%H1369><s%> is not right. swearing: or, cursing course: or, violence

For both prophet <S%H5030><s%> and priest <S%H3548><s%> are profane <S%H2610><s%>; yea, in my house <S%H1004><s%> have I found <S%H4672><s%> their wickedness <S%H7451><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Wherefore their way <S%H1870><s%> shall be unto them as slippery <S%H2519><s%> ways in the darkness <S%H653><s%>: they shall be driven on <S%H1760><s%>, and fall <S%H5307><s%> therein: for I will bring <S%H935><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> upon them, even the year <S%H8141><s%> of their visitation <S%H6486><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And I have seen <S%H7200><s%> folly <S%H8604><s%> in the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%>; they prophesied <S%H5012><s%> in Baal <S%H1168><s%>, and caused my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> to err <S%H8582><s%>. folly: or, an absurd thing: Heb. unsavoury

I have seen <S%H7200><s%> also in the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> an horrible thing <S%H8186><s%>: they commit adultery <S%H5003><s%>, and walk <S%H1980><s%> in lies <S%H8267><s%>: they strengthen <S%H2388><s%> also the hands <S%H3027><s%> of evildoers <S%H7489><s%>, that none <S%H376><s%> doth return <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness <S%H7451><s%>: they are all of them unto me as Sodom <S%H5467><s%>, and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> thereof as Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>. an: or, filthiness

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> concerning the prophets <S%H5030><s%>; Behold, I will feed <S%H398><s%> them with wormwood <S%H3939><s%>, and make them drink <S%H8248><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of gall <S%H7219><s%>: for from the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> is profaneness <S%H2613><s%> gone forth <S%H3318><s%> into all the land <S%H776><s%>. profaneness: or, hypocrisy

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, Hearken <S%H8085><s%> not unto the words <S%H1697><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> that prophesy <S%H5012><s%> unto you: they make you vain <S%H1891><s%>: they speak <S%H1696><s%> a vision <S%H2377><s%> of their own heart <S%H3820><s%>, and not out of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

They say <S%H559><s%> still <S%H559><s%> unto them that despise <S%H5006><s%> me, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath said <S%H1696><s%>, Ye shall have peace <S%H7965><s%>; and they say <S%H559><s%> unto every one that walketh <S%H1980><s%> after the imagination <S%H8307><s%> of his own heart <S%H3820><s%>, No evil <S%H7451><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon you. imagination: or, stubbornness

For who hath stood <S%H5975><s%> in the counsel <S%H5475><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and hath perceived <S%H7200><s%> and heard <S%H8085><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>? who hath marked <S%H7181><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>, and heard <S%H8085><s%> it? counsel: or, secret

Behold, a whirlwind <S%H5591><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is gone forth <S%H3318><s%> in fury <S%H2534><s%>, even a grievous <S%H2342><s%> whirlwind <S%H5591><s%>: it shall fall grievously <S%H2342><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.

The anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall not return <S%H7725><s%>, until he have executed <S%H6213><s%>, and till he have performed <S%H6965><s%> the thoughts <S%H4209><s%> of his heart <S%H3820><s%>: in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> ye shall consider <S%H995><s%> it perfectly <S%H998><s%>.
I have not sent <S%H7971><s%> these prophets <S%H5030><s%>, yet they ran <S%H7323><s%>: I have not spoken <S%H1696><s%> to them, yet they prophesied <S%H5012><s%>.

But if they had stood <S%H5975><s%> in my counsel <S%H5475><s%>, and had caused my people <S%H5971><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%>, then they should have turned <S%H7725><s%> them from their evil <S%H7451><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, and from the evil <S%H7455><s%> of their doings <S%H4611><s%>.
Am I a God <S%H430><s%> at hand <S%H7138><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and not a God <S%H430><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>?

Can any <S%H376><s%> hide <S%H5641><s%> himself in secret places <S%H4565><s%> that I shall not see <S%H7200><s%> him? saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. Do not I fill <S%H4392><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>? saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

I have heard <S%H8085><s%> what the prophets <S%H5030><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, that prophesy <S%H5012><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> in my name <S%H8034><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I have dreamed <S%H2492><s%>, I have dreamed <S%H2492><s%>.

How long shall this be <S%H3426><s%> in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> that prophesy <S%H5012><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%>? yea, they are prophets <S%H5030><s%> of the deceit <S%H8649><s%> of their own heart <S%H3820><s%>;

Which think <S%H2803><s%> to cause my people <S%H5971><s%> to forget <S%H7911><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> by their dreams <S%H2472><s%> which they tell <S%H5608><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>, as their fathers <S%H1><s%> have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> for Baal <S%H1168><s%>.

The prophet <S%H5030><s%> that hath a dream <S%H2472><s%>, let him tell <S%H5608><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%>; and he that hath my word <S%H1697><s%>, let him speak <S%H1696><s%> my word <S%H1697><s%> faithfully <S%H571><s%>. What is the chaff <S%H8401><s%> to the wheat <S%H1250><s%>? saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. that hath a dream: Heb. with whom is, etc

Is not my word <S%H1697><s%> like <S%H3541><s%> as a fire <S%H784><s%>? saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and like a hammer <S%H6360><s%> that breaketh <S%H6327><s%> the rock <S%H5553><s%> in pieces <S%H6327><s%>?

Therefore, behold, I am against the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, that steal <S%H1589><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> from his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>.

Behold, I am against the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, that use <S%H3947><s%> their tongues <S%H3956><s%>, and say <S%H5001><s%>, He saith <S%H5002><s%>. that: or, that smooth their tongues

Behold, I am against them that prophesy <S%H5012><s%> false <S%H8267><s%> dreams <S%H2472><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and do tell <S%H5608><s%> them, and cause my people <S%H5971><s%> to err <S%H8582><s%> by their lies <S%H8267><s%>, and by their lightness <S%H6350><s%>; yet I sent <S%H7971><s%> them not, nor commanded <S%H6680><s%> them: therefore they shall not profit <S%H3276><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> at all <S%H3276><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And when this people <S%H5971><s%>, or the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, or a priest <S%H3548><s%>, shall ask <S%H7592><s%> thee, saying <S%H559><s%>, What is the burden <S%H4853><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>? thou shalt then say <S%H559><s%> unto them, What burden <S%H4853><s%>? I will even forsake <S%H5203><s%> you, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And as for the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, and the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%>, that shall say <S%H559><s%>, The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, I will even punish <S%H6485><s%> that man <S%H376><s%> and his house <S%H1004><s%>. punish: Heb. visit upon

Thus shall ye say <S%H559><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> to his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>, and every one <S%H376><s%> to his brother <S%H251><s%>, What hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%>? and, What hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoken <S%H1696><s%>?

And the burden <S%H4853><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall ye mention <S%H2142><s%> no more: for every man's <S%H376><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> shall be his burden <S%H4853><s%>; for ye have perverted <S%H2015><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>.
Thus shalt thou say <S%H559><s%> to the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, What hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> thee? and, What hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoken <S%H1696><s%>?

But <S%H518><s%> since ye say <S%H559><s%>, The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; Because ye say <S%H559><s%> this word <S%H1697><s%>, The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and I have sent <S%H7971><s%> unto you, saying <S%H559><s%>, Ye shall not say <S%H559><s%>, The burden <S%H4853><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>;

Therefore, behold, I, even I, will utterly <S%H5377><s%> forget <S%H5382><s%> you, and I will forsake <S%H5203><s%> you, and the city <S%H5892><s%> that I gave <S%H5414><s%> you and your fathers <S%H1><s%>, and cast you out of my presence <S%H6440><s%>:
And I will bring <S%H5414><s%> an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> reproach <S%H2781><s%> upon you, and a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> shame <S%H3640><s%>, which shall not be forgotten <S%H7911><s%>.
